text.lezah.spectator_mode2: Your game time is over, you can spectate and do tp!
text.lezah.downgrade: Because an outdated version of LezaH Datapack was put in, the datapack is downgrading RIGHT NOW. The creator of the datapack will not be responsible for what happens.
text.lezah.papermc.compatibility: Your server isn't compatible with LezaH Datapack, your server is using PaperMC, you need to switch to Vanilla or another server software.
advancements.lezah.welcome.title: Welcome, Minecraftian!
advancements.lezah.welcome.desc: You have arrived in this world!
advancements.lezah.killer.title: Killer
advancements.lezah.master_heroe.title: Master Heroe
advancements.lezah.milk.title: The healing taste of milk
advancements.lezah.milk.desc: A bucket of milk will cure all ills
advancements.lezah.datapack.title: LezaH Datapack
advancements.lezah.hitman.title: Hitman
advancements.lezah.warrior_armor.title: Warriors on the attack!
text.lezah.thunder_rod_radius: You can't summon thunders. There aren't entities nearby!
advancements.lezah.thunder_rod.title: A Thunder in a Stick
advancements.lezah.thunder_god.title: Thunder God
advancements.lezah.thunder_god.desc: USE THE THUNDER FORCE IN YOUR SUPER
advancements.lezah.dont_trust_me.title: Don't trust me, you annoying zombie!
advancements.lezah.dont_trust_me.desc: Attack a zombie with your new netherite katana
advancements.lezah.enchanting_something_: I shouldn't enchant a bugged sword with Mending and Unbreaking III, should it?
advancements.lezah.ice_skates.title: Ice Skates... Ready!
advancements.lezah.ice_skates.desc: Equip yourself some good skates to walk on the ice
advancements.lezah.upgrading_something_i: I have a question, Is legal upgrading to netherite an illegal bugged sword?
advancements.lezah.legit.title: LEGIT???
advancements.lezah.legit.desc: IS IT SERIOUSLY POSSIBLE A FREAKING BUGGED SWORD???
advancements.lezah.near_to_death.title: Near to death!
advancements.lezah.time_to_skate.title: Time to Skate!
advancements.lezah.time_to_skate.desc: Walk on the frozen ocean with the Ice Skates equipped!
advancements.lezah.tuned_skates.title: Tuned Skates
advancements.lezah.tuned_skates.desc: Enchant your skates with Frost Walker II and put them on!
Enchant your Netherite Katana with Unbreaking III and Mending
advancements.lezah.healing_station.title: Healing Station
advancements.lezah.healing_station.desc: Place a regenerator to regenerate health
advancements.lezah.pet_shelter.title: Pet Shelter
advancements.lezah.pet_shelter.desc: Shelter your pets near the regenerator and they will be safe and sound
advancements.lezah.zombies_out.title: Zombies, OUT!!
advancements.lezah.zombies_out.desc: The zombies are excluded in this place. You have to secure well at night.
